EgoFooter.php

Footer Box modules are pretty simple. The header_content() method defines the label above the box and the display_content() method defines the box itself. If needed you can define CSS via the class properties.

This module just shows a constant reminder about the store's most critical department.

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 class EgoFooter extends FooterBox {
00004 
00005         var $header_css = "background: #990000; color: #ffffff;";
00006 
00007         var $display_css = "font-weight: bold; font-size: 200%;";
00008 
00009         function header_content(){
00010                 return "notice";
00011         }
00012 
00013         function display_content(){
00014                 return "IT Rules!";
00015         }
00016 }
00017 
00018 ?>
